topic: Changing Majors in Master's Informatics Program

correspondence.message: I am a master's student majoring in Informatics in my 6th semester and want to transfer to the Informatics: Games Engineering major. Are there any restrictions on changing majors, what is the deadline, and what materials do I need to prepare?"

To change your study program, you need to apply regularly during the application period for the new program. The deadline for master's programs is November 30, 2024, for starting in summer semester 2025. You must prepare all required application documents.
